title: Wanted: T206 Cobb Green Port w/Piedmont back
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Wanted: T206 Cobb Green Port w/Piedmont back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tony N.
Looking to purchase a T206 Cobb Green Portrait w/Piedmont back in VG condition (SGC 40).  I would prefer it to be graded by SGC as well.  Please email me with a pic of the front and back, and your price.  Thanks, Tony.
